snippet.title: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard Official Trailer
snippet.description:
I am a solo indie game developer and Inventory Quest is my first publicly released game.

The game is about building a loadout and managing inventoy instead of focusing adventure and combat. All the art is self drawn. 

Google play
Full version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fi.InventoryQuest.InventoryQuest&pcampaignid=web_share
Demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fi.InventoryQuest.InventoryQuestDemo&pcampaignid=web_share

Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2975270/Inventory_Quest_Heros_Hoard/

Big shoutout to Lo Key for letting me use his music!
